review:
We have been visiting Dr. Dhivya from past 1 year & had an exceptional experience. The clinic was very clean, I was particularly impressed by Dr. Dhivya, who treated with the utmost professionalism and care. She took the time to thoroughly explain the condition and treatment options, answering all of our questions with patience and clarity. Her expertise and compassion truly made a difference during our time at the clinic.  No unnecessary medicines & she is very practical.
Overall, I highly recommend this clinic and Dr. Dhivya.
Doctor was friendly, helped us to understand the diagnostic procedure and why the tests are needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I have met Dr. Dhivya  when I was trying to conceive after trying for years. We had wonderful experience with her. Highly recommended for genuine treatment and professional approach. She was very calm and supportive. My end to end journey of pregnancy , delivery was very very soothing both medically and mentally for which I am very thankful to her. She is very humble, friendly , responds even to our silly questions appropriately. Not only the guidance and consultation was cordial but doctor was very patiently took us through whole of our journey . I really, heartfully recommend her to everyone who want to have peaceful pregnancy journey. Thanks doctor for all your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am happy to write a review about Doctor Dhivya, who treated me during my maternity and delivery. Dr. Dhivya is a highly skilled gynecologist who provided exceptional care throughout my pregnancy journey. From the very beginning, she was approachable, friendly, and put me at ease with her warm demeanor.

Dr. Dhivya is a great listener, and she took the time to understand my concerns and questions. She provided clear explanations and made sure that I fully understood my options at every step of the process. She also encouraged me to ask questions and never made me feel rushed or pressured.

During my delivery, Dr. Dhivya was calm, professional, and reassuring. She provided me with the support and guidance I needed to have a smooth and safe delivery. Even during a challenging moment, she remained calm and focused, which helped me to stay calm too.

Overall, I highly recommend Dr. Dhivya for anyone looking for a caring and approachable gynecologist who is highly skilled in maternity and delivery care. She is an exceptional doctor who truly cares about her patients and goes above and beyond to provide the best possible care. Thank you, Dr. Dhivya, for everything you did for me and my family!

I went there as I had white discharge and bp was extremely low and I was feeling like partial faint, The doctor was unable to explain she just said it’s normal have lemon water and asked few reports. Even the ultrasound was done in 4 mins without detailed checking.
reply_text: Your Bp was normal, blood sugar was normal and white discharge is not significant to call it infection, and is not related to Bp. Your water intake was low , I said dehydration issue increase water intake. If doctor doesn’t prescribe a medicine it doesn’t mean they are unable to explain . Sometimes only life style change is Enough to correct your problems. Ultrasound was not done by me and radiologist said it was absolutely normal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all, would like to convey my sincere thanks to doctor Dhivya. **** *** ****** ********* *** ********** we were blessed with a baby girl on 28th March 2021. I would like to share my story so that anyone who falls under my category can be benefited. Based on Google reviews, we visited the doctor for irregular periods and planning maternity. Upon checking my conditions, it is discovered that I had PCOD and hormonal imbalances, in addition to that I have chronic hypothyroidism and was in medication for that. Doctor was very clear with her step by step approach. For first 4 months i was administered some medications to regularise the hormonal imblances.then on 6th month, got pregnant naturally. During the covid days, she was always available to instruct us on things over call and online consultation. Doctor was very patient to explain all our queries. successfully delivered the baby even when I had multiple complications. Only one thing we did was to trust her and followed her advices accordingly. sincere thanks once again
reply_text: Thanks for the feedback and trust on me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
we would highly recommend Dr. Dhivya.

we consulted for our second baby. She is very friendly in explaining the things and from 1st month till delivery  everything she made smooth. 

she gives time to see each and every report in detail and help to clarify all doubts.  Appreciate her availability at all times and her followup with opd duty doctor is excellent.  

I would say people in electronic city looking for pregancy consultation can approach her without any second thought.

Thanks Doctor for doing a great valuable job with ethics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Not worth visiting at all; After reading reviews of this specialist, we were quite optimistic when we came here in an emergency because our gynaecologist wasn't available. We're now feeling quite let down. The doctor didn't show there until 11.45 am despite the fact that our appointment was supposed to start at 10.15 am. The doctor just wanted us to repeat the same process even though we still had all of the earlier prescriptions from our previous gynaecologist. We still had all of our previous gynecologist's prescriptions and the most recent lab results, despite this. The doctor seemed a little mute when we asked her questions. We wasted our time, and we won't go back to see this gynaecologist.  How can someone who doesn't respect others' time give excellent advice to others?
reply_text: Sorry for inconvenience, it’s not that I came late , I was there since 8 am in hospital, I was held up in complicated surgery that took time. What we deal with is someone life it’s not possible to come in-between surgery. More than time someone’s life is important. In partial mole whatever I spoke is as per protocol .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Pregnant,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review: I and my wife met Dr. Dhivya when we were planning to have a child. We were in consultation for sometime.We were taking basic medications for a few months, then suddenly my wife experienced some changes. We consulted Dr. Dhivya again and went for scan, and we got to know that my wife was already over 5 months pregnant.Since that day till today, Dr. Dhivya has been our doctor, our guide for everything. She has always been available on call even in odd hours. Our baby Girl got delivered on 30th Dec, 2021. It is a normal delivery. Thanks to Dr. Dhivya and support staff.Her friendliness, clear communication and the care received from the Doctor is beyond expectations. Apart from everything she is as a doctor, she is a great human being and gives a sense of security (sense of being in safe hands), when she is around.We highly recommend Dr. Dhivya R. Once again Thank you doctor for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ****** ** *** ** *** ************* ******* * **** **** *** * I have visited her for my irregular period after covid . we decided to plan our first child on 2022. after pelvic scan we came to know I am suffering from PCOD .I AM very much happy for doctor's step by step approach .first she gave me some medicines to regularise cycle .Then she put me on ovulation induction . On my second cycle I conceived by God's grace . But I came to my native and unfortunately I stucked here for covid rules . thank you so much doctor for your care and wishes . I am very much fortunate to get you . Will see you soon after coming back . wish everyone will get a doctor like Dr. Dhivya .
reply_text: Thank you. very happy to hear from you

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,
review: Dr. Dhivya is very friendly and caring person. We visited for my wife's 2nd Pregnancy and now we are blessed with a baby girl. She explains all the things very clearly and make us to feel comfortable throughout the pregnancy period. No unnecessary medications and tests were recommended. Necessary food items were only recommended. During covid time also doctor was always available through calls and video consultation. She travelled almost 300 KM in 3hrs when my wife got a false pain and kept us calm by explaining everything. Doctor waited for almost 12hrs to do the normal delivery but unfortunately my wife had some complications which she explained very clearly and went for C-section. We are very happy with her consultation and friendly nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had the most wonderful experience with Dr. Dhivya, and I can't say enough good things about her. She is an exceptional doctor who truly cares about her patients and goes beyond expectations to ensure their well-being. From the moment I stepped into her clinic I felt comfortable 
Her  friendly nature  immediately put me at ease, making it easy to open up and discuss my concerns. She is an active listener, patiently hears each and every detail of my health,She never rushed through any part of the consultation and asked many questions to get to the root cause of the problem. Her  dedication to  profession were truly impressive.she spreads positive energy,her care and concern through pregnancy and delivery was amazing,she encouraged me to deliver normally inspite of thefact I was afraid,she was very cool even during delivery

Even after paying consultation fees doctor didn’t write the medications and the hospital purposely asked to buy MTP package they said after taking the package only u will get medication Bt medications was not included in package and doctor also didn’t explained initially about the cost nor the hospital informed
reply_text: I have informed you to discuss the package in reception.Have explained about medicine and asked whether you needed further clarification. If you are not ok with hospital policy , could have informed us regarding the same

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were consulting Dr Dhivya during the pregnancy of our second child. She is one of the best gynaecologist we have met so far. She is so friendly and approachable. She made us very comfortable during the entire maternity period. Doctor doesn't even write any extra tests or medicines. She is very open with the patient. Finally we had a normal delivery in Kauvery hospital Bangalore last week. 
We sincerely thank Dhivya mam and recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Dhivya helped me through my  first  and second pregnancy. both of them went well and all our doubts were immediately cleared. she guided through all the procedures and everything. Never recommended unwanted things and always made me to follow natural diet. She was really supportive during both my pregnancies and was available through calls whenever we needed. She is friendly and approachable . Thank you Dr for your support and guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am so happy that we consulted with Dr. Divya  for my in law problem post menopause.The way she explains provide the confidence to the patients directly.Always available  to clear any doubts even the silly question we asked her.Doctor helped us throughout the procedure of treatment. Easily approachable, so friendly,calmness, completely taking care of patients  which make them more comfortable and confident throughout the complete process.

Every woman would be scared during their first  pregnancy but getting the friendly Doctor Who guides, explains and helps proactively and take care like a family member is a boon to a woman , I am happy that I met the **** doctor in my pregnancy by God's grace. I am happy to suggest the Divya doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I went to Dr. Dhivya R to consult for pregnancy planning as I have thyroid. Firstly she corrected my thyroid through proper medication then she suggested proper daily routine to keep myself healthy. I must say her suggestions and friendly nature will always keep you positive. And just after 2 months I conceived.

I will surely recommend Dr. Dhivya R for any pregnancy planning.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

My wife had C-Section and blessed with baby girl. DR.Divya gave my wife a good post operative care and guided well to take care of both baby and mother. I recommend Dr. Divya for any gynec and obstetric related treatment. Finally thank you soo much mam!!!!

review: I have recently delivered healthy baby boy on July 20th. I have been going to Dr Dhivya starting from my 5th month of pregnancy. Her diagnosis was very detail. She always have clear idea about our profile and carefully examine each factors and aids our pregnancy smoothly. She never left a single stone unturned. She also never gives unnecessary stress or extra medications etc. She also clearly explains the treatment she's giving in and explains the necessity of each tests or procedures we are going to take. On my big day I had a very good support from Kauvery Hospital Staffs and from Dr Dhivya. I would definitely recommend her to have a safe and stress-free delivery.

review: I visited Dr.Dhivya for my first pregnancy. She was vry patient, vry friendly and supported us vry much throught my pregnancy and post delivery also. Best part is she was always reachable and she never recommends unnecessary tests nor advices for extra medication if it can be cured by natural food. During my pregnancy i was affected with covid and during that time also she was vry supportive. She informed us earlier only that there are chances of pre-delivery . In 34th week of pregnancy my water got broke and we were highly tensed and from the time we informed her, she was following us vry regularly. By the time we reached hospital she was available and took care of evrything and after some tests she explained us the situation and in next 2 hours baby boy was born . Currently me and baby boy both are doing gud. Thank you so much doctor

review: I went to her multiple times for the treatment for my wife. Treatment cost is extremely high without any justification. Wait time is high & treatment satisfactions needs to improved. I didn't had a good experience.
reply_text: Sorry.you have visited me twice regarding termination of pregnancy.In the first visit I have explained everything and even though only patient came,I had called patients husband and explained  about the procedure and cost.once you agreed about the procedure ,cost and gave consent to undergo we proceeded with.Also cost of the procedure in an any corporate hospital is fixed by them not doctors.And on the specific visits I was well available in the clinic and there was no time delay because of me.
